<cs> i have to make the confession that i am a foundation governor <e> <s> i also find if i am unlucky enough to be rung up by the press that their first question is what is your age <e> <s> i am tempted these days to make it older and older <e> <s> i make it now but i think it might get older <e> <s> i have never had any feeling whatsoever of difference in voting <e> <s> it had never occurred to me to vote in any way except for what i believed was for the best interest of the school <e> <s> it had never occurred to me until your lordships brought it up this afternoon that there should where the welfare of the schools is concerned be a difference in the voting between foundation and other governors <e>
<cs> my lords i should like to support the amendment of the noble lord lord reigate <e>
